---
name: "User Story"
about: "Create a new feature request in user story format"
title: "[Story] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

**As** [type of user],  
**I want** [goal/feature],  
**So that** [benefit].

---

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] When I [action], then [expected behavior]

---

## Definition of Done

- [ ] Code reviewed
- [ ] Deployed to staging
